subject: [junit] Ant Help
msgSnippet: Hi, I am using Ant with JUnit.I I included Junit and optional jar in ANT_HOME lib folder. But when I tried to use Ant, it will give java.lang.NoSuchMethodError
messageBody:
Hi,

I am using Ant with JUnit.I I included Junit and optional jar in
ANT_HOME\lib folder.
But when I tried to use Ant, it will give
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTask.executeInVM(JU
nitTask.java:769) and shows error in <junit printsummary="true">

Please help me.

Thanks

Sanjay M
